mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, noticeno, noticetitle, noticedesc, noticeregdate, noticemoddate, noticeviewcount FROM (select * from notice WHERE noticetitle LIKE '%'||#{keywordTitle}||'%' AND noticedesc LIKE '%'||#{keywordDesc}||'%' order by noticeno desc) ORDER BY noticeno asc) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{sizePerPage}*#{page}-9 and #{sizePerPage}*#{page} ORDER BY noticeno DESC
SELECT count(noticeNo) FROM notice WHERE noticetitle LIKE '%'||#{keywordTitle}||'%' AND noticedesc LIKE '%'||#{keywordDesc}||'%'
SELECT * FROM(SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY noticeno DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
